original_text: When he had gone through those regions and had given them much encouragement, he came to Greece.
korean_text: 그 지방으로 다녀가며 여러 말로 제자들에게 권하고 헬라에 이르러

sentences.original_text: When he had gone through those regions
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 지방들을 거쳐 갔을 때

sentences.original_text: and had given them much encouragement
